content.rendered:
Nathan Drake and treasure hunter Victor “Sully” Sullivan set out to recover the Magellan treasure, lost 500 years ago. Santiago Moncada believes that he and his family are the rightful heirs. When Nate and Sully solve one of the world’s oldest mysteries, they find a treasure worth $5 billion, and maybe even Nate’s long-lost brother.

Directed By Ruben Fleischer

Written By Rafe Judkins. Art Marcum. Matt Holloway

Stars: Tom Holland. Mark Wahlberg. Antonio Banderas
